subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: ORLANDO, Fla. (AP) — Jason Kidd just missed having a triple-double and made a key defensive stop as the Nets overcame a 15-point deficit to defeat the Orlando Magic on Wednesday night, 96-95.
snippet: ORLANDO, Fla. (AP) — Jason Kidd just missed having a triple-double and made a key defensive stop as the Nets overcame a 15-point deficit to defeat the Orlando Magic on Wednesday night, 96-95.
